member.name: SHREGDEL_FLAGS
member.summary: Provides a set of values that indicate from which base key an item will be deleted.

member.name: SHREGDEL_FLAGS.SHREGDEL_DEFAULT
member.summary: Deletes from HKEY_CURRENT_USER. If the specified item is not found under HKEY_CURRENT_USER, deletes from HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE.

member.name: SHREGDEL_FLAGS.SHREGDEL_BOTH
member.summary: Deletes from both HKEY_CURRENT_USER and HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE.
